import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { Header } from "../../common/Header"; import { Home } from "./Home"; import { Assets } from "./Assets"; import { Domain } from "./Domain"; import { MDBBtn, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardText, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBInput, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBLink } from "mdbreact"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import logo from '../../assets/images/logo-white-large.png'; import "./style.css" export const Dashboard = (props: any) => { const [view, setView] = useState('home'); const SwitchView = (value: any) => { console.log(value) setView(value) } const Account = (value: any) => { console.log(value) setAccount(value) } console.log(props) const history = useHistory(); const Switch = (e: any) => { console.log(e) setView(e) } if (props.User === undefined) { return } if (props.User !== undefined && props.User.isOnboarded === false) { return } return ( <> {/*
*/}
